ASDC Gozzano is a football club based in the town of Gozzano, situated in the province of Novara, in the Piedmont region of Italy. The club was founded in 1921 and currently competes in Serie D, which is the fourth tier of the Italian football league system.
Wow, I didn't realize Gozzano had a football club. What's their stadium like? Is it a big arena, or more of a local field?

The home ground of ASDC Gozzano is the Stadio Alfredo Rebora, which is a sports facility that was renovated in 2010. The stadium has a seating capacity of 2,200 spectators, and it features a natural grass playing surface. Although not a big arena, the Stadio Alfredo Rebora is equipped with professional standards and provides an excellent venue for the team's home games.
